posts.post_content:
This card is disgustingly good.  
Don't get me wrong: for a 5 mana investment (you're tapping this land as well as paying its cost), you'd better be getting something worth your while.  
However, one activation of this can single-handedly swing the game irrecoverably in your favour.

Posted By: DoragonShinzui (3/18/2012 11:18:32 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Once upon a time, years ago, there was a guild known as the Orzhov Syndicate. In those days, they were led by a fearsome group, the [Ghost Council of Orzhova](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ghost Council of Orzhova). This Ghost Council turned out to be the absolute king of combat, taking full advantage of the tricks that came with damage on the stack. Alas, all reigns must come to an end, and so too did that of the Orzhov.  
  
But now, after so many years of lying dormant and patiently waiting, they have seen fit to return and once again dominate the combat step. Behold, their newest weapon of terror.
posts.html:
Once upon a time, years ago, there was a guild known as the Orzhov Syndicate. In those days, they were led by a fearsome group, the Ghost Council of Orzhova. This Ghost Council turned out to be the absolute king of combat, taking full advantage of the tricks that came with damage on the stack. Alas, all reigns must come to an end, and so too did that of the Orzhov.

But now, after so many years of lying dormant and patiently waiting, they have seen fit to return and once again dominate the combat step. Behold, their newest weapon of terror.
